title: Birthday Gift Card
short_description: A timeless gift for any occasion.
description: The Classic Floral Gift Card lets your loved ones choose their favorite bouquets or plants from FLWR. Perfect when you want to gift beauty but leave the choice to them.

title: Love & Romance Gift Card
short_description: For heartfelt moments and deep emotions.
description: Designed for romantic gestures, the Love & Romance Gift Card is ideal for anniversaries, proposals, and Valentine’s surprises. Let flowers speak love, your way.

title: Calm & Care Gift Card
short_description: A gentle way to show you care.
description: The Calm & Care Gift Card is perfect for sympathy, self-care, or wellness gifts. Featuring soothing tones and natural designs, it’s made to bring comfort and calm.

title: Corporate Gift Card
description: The Luxury Bloom Gift Card is curated for premium floral arrangements and rare indoor plants. Ideal for corporate gifting, weddings, or unforgettable moments.
